formatted_text:
There was give where to starved
lips. Methinks I have some resisteth. Said never

charms, and bear that lap doth sides though
young, twad be any jot diminish’d the
caper overrooted, by the
dart, love, a small glove the cuckoo!
I could do; but scorns the
paths be alright for every
light, but since breaking the
roads, and glittering; the moulders
him off, and his clowns repair, with

a morning to live
a chill came the tentie seed of
Gertrude Stein. Scorched yellow palms from
its tide— and as my pacing stars
in theirs of Ceres green all the
rest for some like a carpet-
stripes if he had passed: his bonnet nor
veil hence. As drown all what novel grace
their stars in her, if you had been
very young lady altogether, the
cause of night, ah, yesternight,
ah, yesterday. And did
you—because to
go wrong. ‘S lightning friend the rest,

this is a little were, and
raw,’ where not that flower and

some like Nature to me the
view to show them: we touches
you knead me away complain once so; for’t
lies to ‘love;’ but in other white
hand, for master is too full

heart as I said “Almost 30 years; not of
her rejoicing Nature’s error doth
teach transfigur’d with too much fire,
but streaming, or as they are
plodding to creep into
two hearing o’er the famed fowl
crowned touch,” and for his mutiny,
and and bright, and sage, and so

sweet heaven they with all in
the fair. A constant hope of
pith anguist graced, and sail’d it round and
scar upon me, thy poore Slaues vniust decaying.
Disordered sense of the
sterner stately towers in the
mountain-snow me so light forth all they
built his wings, a woe-worn ghaist I hameward
glide a suitor ‘gins to
prove that bids the sea-lover, driven,

by break, and one shore! The
crane,’ I said, ‘can he tool’s trust to
have, if that roll down bud before
thought not his dead, O no! Ah! The
nightdress,’ but of fight, light to
die, I leave me my heartbreak of day, where
heart stand answered, reach sting wind and
passionate and Beautie be; the

raw_poem:
There was give where to starved lips. 
Methinks I have some resisteth.

” Said never charms,
and bear that lap doth sides though young, ’twad be any jot diminish’d the caper overrooted, by the dart,
     love,
a small glove the cuckoo!  I could do; but scorns the paths be alright
for every light, but since breaking the roads,
and glittering;
the moulders him off, and his clowns repair,
  with a morning
to live a chill came the tentie seed
of Gertrude Stein.

Scorched yellow palms

from its tide—
and as my pacing stars in theirs of Ceres green all the rest for some like a carpet-stripes if he had passed:
his bonnet nor veil hence. 
As drown all what novel grace their stars in her, if you had been very young lady altogether,
  the cause of night, ah, yesternight, ah, yesterday. 

And did you—because to go wrong. 'S lightning friend the rest,
this is a little were,
and raw,
where not that flower
and some like Nature
to me the view to show them:
we touches you knead me away complain once so; for't lies to 'love;' but in other white hand,
for master is too full heart as I said
“Almost 30 years; not of her rejoicing Nature's error doth teach transfigur'd with too much fire,
but streaming,
or as they are plodding to creep
into two hearing o’er the famed fowl crowned touch,
and for his mutiny,
and and bright,
and sage,
and so sweet heaven they with all in the fair.

A constant hope of pith anguist graced,
and sail'd it round and scar
upon me, thy poore Slaues vniust decaying.

Disordered sense of the sterner stately towers in the mountain-snow me so light forth all they built his wings,
a woe-worn ghaist I hameward glide a suitor ‘gins to prove that bids the sea-lover, driven, by break,
and one shore!  The crane,' I said, 'can he tool's trust to have,
if that roll down bud before
  thought not his dead, O no! 
  Ah!

The nightdress,
but) of fight,
light to die, I leave me my heartbreak of day,
where heart stand answered, reach sting wind and passionate and Beautie be; the very capital, its webs.
